originalText.text: It was my first time getting fitted for contact lenses and I couldn't have had a better experience! The office was super clean and organized, and the front-desk staff were and helpful and really patient. Dr. Lin was very attentive and helped alleviate a lot of my fears when putting in and taking out my contacts and performed a comprehensive exam to make sure my eyes were healthy.Would highly recommend coming here for any eye checkups/ contact lens fitting needs!

originalText.text: I got my Lasik in January after finding about this place on Google. Dr. Zhou explained the procedure, pre- and post- instructions very thoroughly. Surgery went very smooth, actual procedure only took about 10-15 mins (this all depends if you comply with their instructions). Now it‚Äôs been 3 months post Lasik surgery. Dr. Zhou has listened and helped with my concerns such as dry eyes and seasonal allergies that affect my eyes for the recovery. It‚Äôs been amazing being able to see everything as soon as I wake up and don‚Äôt have to worry about contact lens prescription, cleaning, etc that comes with it. Overall excellent experience with Dr. Zhou and no complaints.
